channel.title: spdy on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in spdy on Inductive Bias

item.title: ApacheConNA: Misc
item.description: ApacheConNA: Misc # In his talk on Spdy Mathew Steele explained how he implemented the spdy protocol as an Apache httpd module - working around most of the safety measures and design decisions in the current httpd version. Essentially to get httpd to support the protocol all you need now is mod_spdy plus a modified version of mod_ssl. The keynote on the last day was given by the Puppet founder.
